product_information.text_save_password: Store all your passwords, data or any information here, forget paper notes and unprotected applications.
product_information.text_master_password: Create your master key: only you can access your secrets with it.
product_information.text_first_place: First of all, you need to create a different password for your electronic belongings. You will not be able to recover your password, so remember it well.
product_information.text_what_data_save: For example, your card number, the PIN and PUK of your mobile phone, the serial number of one of your devices or any information you need to have in a safe place.
